activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#5515
activity.text:
I got the project running in my system and here is what I did:
1. run `npm cache clean --force`
2. Update the node version to 18.16.0 and npm version to 9.6.7(current latest ersions)
3. run `npm install --legacy-peer-deps`
4. run `npm run dev`

I updated the node version because I found this:[ https://github.com/vitejs/vite/issues/9113#issuecomment-1184319357](url)

How to resolve this issue?
